articles.title: ‘Blatant aggression’: Reactions to US veto of Palestine’s UN membership bid - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The vote in the 15-member Security Council was 12 in favour and two abstentions – the UK and Switzerland.
articles.content:
The United States vetoed a draft resolution at the UN Security Council (UNSC) which recommended granting the State of Palestine full membership in the United Nations.
The veto on Thursday by Israels… [+5459 chars]
